meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the cod family of fishes.
meanings.sent1: The gadoid fish swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the gadoid species to learn more about their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The gadoid fish told a joke to the other sea creatures, making them all laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as sleek and agile as a gadoid fish in water.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the colorful scales of the gadoid fish.

meanings.definition: A fish of the cod family.
meanings.sent1: The gadoid was caught by the fisherman and brought on board.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed cooking gadoid for dinner due to its delicious taste.
meanings.sent3: The gadoid fish in the aquarium seemed to be chatting with the other fish.
meanings.sent4: The old sailor told tales of the legendary gadoid that got away.
meanings.sent5: The gadoid's scales shimmered under the sunlight, captivating all who saw it.
